decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - Other than when in use, any cycle(s) shall be stored at all times within the designated store detailed on Drawing No. AR-P06 (Proposed Ground Floor Plan).

REASON: To ensure that cycle parking arrangements are acceptable, and to ensure the development does not adversely impact upon the flow and safety of pedestrians along the highway.

Condition : 2 - Other than on collection days, bins shall be stored at all times within the storage area detailed on Drawing No. AR-P06 (Proposed Ground Floor Plan).

REASON: To ensure the development does not adversely impact upon the flow and safety of pedestrians along the highway.

Condition : 3 - Prior to the occupation of the new units hereby permitted, details of sound insulation in the form of cross section drawing(s) between the ceiling of the ground floor commercial premises directly below and the flooring of the proposed residential units shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority.  The new units hereby permitted shall not be occupied until sound insulation has been installed in accordance with the approved details and shall thereafter be retained. 

REASON: To safeguard the amenity of prospective residents.

Condition : 4 - The roof area of the ground floor element of the building which is directly accessible from Flat 1 shall not be used at any time as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the local planning authority.

REASON: To accord with the requirements of Class MA of Part 3 of Schedule 2 of The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
description: Change of use from Office  (Class E) To 2 Self-Contained Flats (Class C3) on first floor; (Prior Approval Of Transport & Highways Impacts Of The Development, Contamination Risks And Flooding Risks On The Site, and Impacts Of Noise From Commercial Premises On The Intended Occupiers Of The Development and provision of natural light in all habitable rooms)
